name: control-viscosity
title: Control Viscosity
description: Allows you to control Viscosity VPN client and connect to or disconnect from your VPN connections.
author: dionisis_lialios

commands.name: connect-to-the-first-connection
commands.title: Connect to the First Connection
commands.description: Connects to the first connection in your connections list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
